item.title: Experience the rich history and art at Apricot Hotel in Hanoi
item.description:
Source: Apricot Hotel website. Hanoi’s latest luxury hotel, Apricot Hotel, is now open in the heart of Vietnam’s cultural and political center, with a grand opening planned for later this summer*. The 10-story Apricot Hotel, formerly the Phú Gia Hotel, a renowned gathering place for the city’s elite since the 1920s, holds significant historical weight. This five-star hotel offers stunning views of Hoan Kiem Lake and Hanoi’s Old Quarter. It boasts 123 neo-classical rooms, two restaurants, a lobby lounge, a cafe, a rooftop bar with a heated swimming pool, meeting rooms, a spa, and a fitness center...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-the-rich-history-and-art-at-apricot-hotel-in-hanoi/

item.title: The Amara Sanctuary Resort Sentosa introduces the Amara Heritage Trail
item.description:
Amara Sanctuary Resort Sentosa is launching its first-ever Amara Heritage Trail. This tour allows guests to explore the resort’s hidden natural surroundings, conservation efforts, and historical significance. Source: Amara Sanctury Resort Sentosa. The petai tree is one of 26 heritage trees in Sentosa protected by the Heritage Tree Scheme under Singapore’s National Parks Board. The seeds are edible. The resort sits on ten acres of land that once housed British military barracks and air raid shelters built between 1897 and 1905 and later renovated in the 1920s...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-amara-sanctuary-resort-sentosa-introduces-the-amara-heritage-trail/
